bibl.title: Egyptian Callimachus.
bibl.note: Concentrates on Callimachus' positioning of Egypt in his own poetry, that is, explores the variety of ways in which persons, places, or things Egyptian appear.

bibl.title: Franco MONTANARI et Luigi LEHNUS (Entretiens préparés et présidés par), Callimaque = Entretiens sur l'Antiquité classique. XLVIII

bibl.seg: Franco MONTANARI et Luigi LEHNUS (Entretiens préparés et présidés par), Callimaque = Entretiens sur l'Antiquité classique. XLVIII (Vandoeuvres - Genève, 2002) pp. 235-262; - 263-270.
Concentrates on Callimachus' positioning of Egypt in his own poetry, that is, explores the variety of ways in which persons, places, or things Egyptian appear.
